website_summaries.verdict: Professional quality made for casual use with features specifically designed to smooth hair.
pros: Gets lots of notice for its ability to tame frizzy hair and create sleek styles with ease
Smooths and polishes hair to make it shiny
A digital display makes it easy to see the exact temperature you are using, which you can change from Fahrenheit to Celsius

customer_reviews.title: Liked the straightener while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Liked the straightener while it lasted. Only one side heats now. Lasted exactly two years, all of my Paul Mitchell tools have. Bums me out paying over $100 for a flat iron and it not lasting longer. Probably won't buy anymore Paul Mitchell products.

customer_reviews.title: I was super disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was super disappointed with this product. I have curly hair and it takes several attempts with this iron to get my hair close to being straight and it still fails at doing it's job. It's doesn't get hot enough and it doesn't flatten well. I had an earlier style of this same product and it was the best. But when I sought out a replacement and chose to go with the same product, it was a huge disappointment. They have changed something about the heating element and it is not as good as their previous products. I suggest saving your money and buying a different flat iron. This one is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.text: I have very course, thick, kinky hair! And my hair requires every bit of 410°. This flatiron glides through your hair without pulling. I love it and purchased another one for my sister.

product_meta.title: Paul Mitchell Pro Tools Express Ion Smooth+ Flat Iron
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackGet supremely sleek and silky-smooth strands fast with the Express Ion Smooth®+ 1.25" Flat Iron from Paul Mitchell® Pro Tools™. Gently smoothes hair faster with negative ions and far infrared heat. Express Ion Complex™ is fused to the ceramic plates to ensure healthy, hydrated results with incredible shine. Beveled edges ensure no line of demarcation. Slim plate design allows for straightening close to the roots for a completely smooth look. Overall wider size of the tool is ideal for smoothing larger sections of hair in less time. Pro features include: Express Ion Complex™ fused deep into the plates, 1.25" cushioned ceramic plates with beveled edges, digital temperature control with LCD display, premium heaters provide even heat distribution, heats up to 410°F in 60 seconds with 5-second heat recovery time, dual voltage for worldwide use, one-hour auto shut-off, 9-foot professional length swivel cord.

BRAND STORY
Paul Mitchell Pro Tools are value-priced styling tools from John Paul Mitchell Systems—the leader of salon-quality products committed to the professional beauty industry. Every purchase supports JPMS salons with a commission.
